text: Böðvar Böðvarsson (born 9 April 1995) is an Icelandic football defender, who currently plays for Jagiellonia Białystok. ==Club career== On 5 February 2018, Böðvarsson signed a three and a half year contract with Jagiellonia Białystok. ==International career== Böðvar has been involved with the U-19 and U-21 teams, and made his senior team debut against China at the 2017 China Cup.http://www.ksi.is/mot/motalisti/leikskyrsla/?Leikur=405779 ==References== ==External links== *Profile at 90minut.pl *Profile at ksi.is * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Icelandic footballers Category:Fimleikafélag Hafnarfjarðar players Category:Association football defenders Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark Category:Jagiellonia Białystok players Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Danish Superliga players Category:Iceland youth international footballers
title: Böðvar Böðvarsson
